verses.name: Jeremiah 25:25
verses.text: And all the kings of Zimri, and all the kings of Elam, and all the kings of the Medes,

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:26
verses.text: And all the kings of the north, far and near, one with another, and all the kingdoms of the world, which are upon the face of the earth: and the king of Sheshach shall drink after them.

verses.name: Jeremiah 25:27
verses.text: Therefore thou shalt say unto them, Thus saith the Lord of hosts, the God of Israel; Drink ye, and be drunken, and spue, and fall, and rise no more, because of the sword which I will send among you.
